name: Who Killed Marigold: a Jazz Age Murder Mystery Dating Sim
name_original: Who Killed Marigold: a Jazz Age Murder Mystery Dating Sim
description:
A sorority is having a 1920s-themed murder mystery party, and you're invited! Play as Riley Fitzpatrick, a wealthy Manhattan socialite who's come to this little college town to seek out an education- and a marriage. Romance three different love interests both in and out of character, and solve the mystery of who killed Marigold- before it's too late!

CREDITS:

Writing by Abby Milonas

Art by Abby Milonas (drawn in Paint Tool Sai 1.1.0)
